Articles.Content:
A total of 24 members will compete against each other to be crowned the winner!

Ill be using a site suited just for this.

Comment below if you want to enter.

The game will start once we have 24 competing members.

Competing Members:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-15T22:16:03Z" title="04/15/2015 10:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 15, 2015</time> by rasheed**
I SIGN UP FOR 3? is that where they have the factories? or is that 13?
More members are needed. Don't be shy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Well, I'll gladly go with Maximus. What are we doing, exactly, if I may ask?
I sign up for 12. And if you add a 13 somehow, be sure to move me there.
What is this? What challenges would we be doing?
I call district 13 or 6 or 9 or any of the districts you put me in ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Well you see guys, you are basically putting yourself into a large gambling situation where its all defined by chance.
Yaaaaaa wasting my life on gambling ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I VOLUNTEER!!!! I VOLUNTEER AS TRIBUTE!!!!!

\*Pushes guards out of the way\* I volunteer as tribute!

"From District 4"
I wanna be district 8! It's symmetrical!
Can I join? I don't care what district I'm in.
